ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Detail level - Low ...?
ygData.msgSnippet: The overhead view is much less laggy, and I find it easier to do crowd control that way, anyway, except in really big, messy fights.  I ve got timing down now
ygData.messageBody:
The overhead view is much less laggy, and I find it easier to do crowd control that way, anyway, except in
really big, messy fights. I've got timing down now well enough that I can twist 3.5 (BoH) to 4.5 songs
without anything dropping, even if it's muddy. Big events (dragons and stuff), it's 2-3.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 55 songs, Innoruuk
